channel.title: Posts on HueZhang Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on HueZhang Blog

item.title: 日常发布blog命令
item.description: $ hugo new [posts]/[name]/index.md $ hugo server -D $ hugo $ git status $ git add . $ git commit -m '[描述信息]' $ git push origin

item.title: 解决gitPermission denied
item.description: 解决 git@github.com: Permission denied (publickey). vim ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub copy the ssh key Go to the github settings Select the option ssh keys Remove the old ssh keys not used anymore. Add a new ssh key. 如果没有id_rsa.pub ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "xx@example.com"
